thread.title: Recommended Robot and AI Reads This Week
thread.title_full: Recommended Robot and AI Reads This Week

title: Recommended Robot and AI Reads This Week
text:
October 21, 2015 Recommended Robot and AI Reads This Week A roundup of interesting stories on robotics and artificial intelligence from other sites, collected by Will Knight, MIT Technology Review ’s senior editor for AI. 
Yelp is Using Image Search to Change How It Finds You a Bar Here’s an interesting example of how deep learning could change the way we access information online. Yelp is using the AI technique to recognize the contents of photographs of bars and restaurants to help customers find the right place to have a beer or a bite. 
Farm Robot Learns What Weeds Look Like, Smashes Them A device developed by Bosch can be trained to recognize weeds and then crush them using what is described, rather ominously, as “a ramming rod.” It’s all part of a broader trend of robots moving into new, more complex areas of agriculture.
